resources.string:
This screen will display what is currently playing, as well as display options suck as next song, pause and so on. We will have to recall the current song playing, as well as send intents for the different buttons clicked.
We will be using the mediaplayer() class here.

This screen will display music sets this DJ had created. This will have to pull data from an outside resource and diplay them. we will have to figure out a way to store and pull external data perhaps through .sqlite()
This will allow users to search for sets made by other dj\'s. This will make us have to have a search mechanism. This will be searching and pulling from a database, also adding filters in.
This area will display the users favorite dj\'s and their new sets.
